tool_description: Transit APIs for urban transport and mobility Apps in selected cities from LATAM.
name: Transit
title: Transit

api_list.name: /realtimeFeed/{city_id}/vehiclePositions
api_list.description: Returns vehicle positions in GTFS-realtime format by city ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://transit4.p.rapidapi.com/realtimeFeed/45/vehiclePositions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transit4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /realtimeFeed/{city_id}/tripUpdates
api_list.description: Returns trip updates in GTFS-realtime format by city ID
